forms Module
============

.. toctree::

    forms
.. .. class:: Form(ctx:discord.ext.commands.Context,title:str)
..
    The base form object. It will eventually

..      .. method:: add_question(question:str, qtype)
        Adds *question* to the form.
        * question - The question to use.
        * qtype - the input validation type.
